SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Network

Class GameServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Network.GameServer
public class GameServer extends Object
Class that unifies the RMI and Socket servers and runs both.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    boolean
    rmiHasToClose
    A flag that indicates if the RMI server has to close and kick the clients.

  • Field Details

    • rmiHasToClose

      public boolean rmiHasToClose
      A flag that indicates if the RMI server has to close and kick the clients.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameServer

      public GameServer(String a, int p)
      Constructor that starts both SocketServer and RMIServer. This is used when creating a new game.
      Parameters:
      a - address of the servers
      p - port of the servers

    • GameServer

      public GameServer(String a, int p, String gameID) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Constructor that starts both SocketServer and RMIServer. This is used when loading an existing game.
      Parameters:
      a - address of the servers
      p - port of the servers
      gameID - ID of the game
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Method to run both SocketServer and RMIServer.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      A method that stops the servers by stopping the RMI server, stopping the heartbeat checking, and interrupting the socket server.

    • sendGameInfo

      public void sendGameInfo()
      A method that sends the game information to all players.

    • sendInitialGameInfo

      public void sendInitialGameInfo()
      A method that sends the initial game information to all players.

    • startRMIServer

      public void startRMIServer()
      Starts the RMI server and binds it to the registry.

    • stopRMIServer

      public void stopRMIServer()
      Stops the RMI server by unbinding it from the registry and setting the RMI server running flag to false.

    • addRMIClient

      public int addRMIClient(int hashCode)
      Adds a new RMIClient to the list of RMI clients if the RMIServer is running.
      Parameters:
      hashCode - the hashCode of the client to be added
      Returns:
      the index of the newly added client in the list of RMI clients, or -1 if the RMI server is not running

    • addSocketClient

      public int addSocketClient(Socket client)
      Adds a new SocketClient to the list of socket clients.
      Parameters:
      client - the socket client to be added
      Returns:
      the index of the newly added client in the list of socket clients

    • tryStartingMatch

      public void tryStartingMatch()
      A method that checks if enough players are connected and starts the match if there are.

    • tryRestartingMatch

      public void tryRestartingMatch()
      A method that checks if all players have rejoined and restarts the match if they have.

    • incrementChosenObjectivesCounter

      public void incrementChosenObjectivesCounter()
      A method that increments the chosen objectives counter and sends initial game information if the counter reaches the number of players.

      msg - the content of the message
